meanings.definition: Add notes to (a text or diagram) giving explanation or comment.
meanings.sent1: She annotates her favorite book with colorful sticky notes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher annotates the student's essay to provide feedback.
meanings.sent3: He annotates the recipe with funny comments to make his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist annotates her painting with hidden meanings for the viewers to discover.
meanings.sent5: The scientist annotates the map with important discoveries to remember them easily.

meanings.definition: Provide with critical or explanatory notes.
meanings.sent1: The editor annotates the manuscript with helpful suggestions for improvement.
meanings.sent2: The historian annotates the document to explain its significance.
meanings.sent3: She annotates the movie script with sarcastic comments to entertain herself.
meanings.sent4: The coach annotates the game plan with strategic insights for the team.
meanings.sent5: He annotates the report with detailed explanations to clarify complex ideas.
